message_1: A shipping company has 7 packages to be delivered, and it has 3 available trucks to use. Each truck can accommodate a maximum of 4 packages. What is the minimum number of trucks the company needs to deliver all the packages?
message_2: To deliver all 7 packages using the least number of trucks, the company can load 4 packages on the first truck and 3 packages on the second truck. This way, they will use only 2 trucks to deliver all the packages.
